comments:
Description: JUnit test will not run if test method name is DBCS.
 Build date: TPTP 200603231133, Eclipse I20060322-1335, IBM JRE 5.0 SR1
 OS: Windows2003 Server Japanese sp1
        Steps to recreate problem:
        1- TPTP JUnit Test Cases, step 3. Edit a JUnit test
        2- enter DBCS for Test method name, then perform step g.
        3- run Test
        
        following error is displayed at consolelog and test is not run.


Thread[xmlParserThread,5,main] - fragmentsCount=1: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.common.XMLexecutionEventLoader.addYourself
InContext(XMLexecutionEventLoader.java:236)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.common.XMLmessageEventLoader.addYourselfIn
Context(XMLmessageEventLoader.java:67)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.XMLLoader.endElement(XMLLoader.java:290)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler$RegularHandler.end
Element(SAXFragmentHandler.java:175)
        at org.apache.xerces.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.endElement(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLDocumentFragmentScannerImpl.scanEndElement(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLDocumentFragmentScannerImpl$FragmentContent
Dispatcher.dispatch(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLDocumentFragmentScannerImpl.scanDocument(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XMLParser.parse(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.xerces.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.parse(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.xerces.jaxp.SAXParserImpl.parse(Unknown Source)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler.parse(SAXFragmentHandler.java:128)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler$1.run(SAXFragmentHandler.java:65)
Exception in thread "TCPDataFiller" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.XMLExecutionDataProcessor.dataSe
rverExited(XMLExecutionDataProcessor.java:92)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.common.TCPDataServer$TCPD
ataProcessorNew.run(TCPDataServer.java:772)

This bug has been identified as a major or blocking bug by the enablement testers. If at all possible, please find a fix or workaround asap because the testers need to verify the fix (or finish the test) by Fri Apr 7.

I tested the attached project with our i2 test pass 1 build (TPTP-4.2.0-200604031056) on Win2k Pro, with East Asian languages installed, using both the RAC and the new Agent Controller.  In each case, the test passed, with a complete execution history that corectly references the test method containing DBCS characters.

I see two likely possibilities:

1) This problem is OS specific (Win 2003 server), or manifests itself only in certain language editions of Windows (fails on Japanese windows, but succeeds on english windows with Japanese langauge available and in use.)

2) User error or unreproducible failure.

Given the effort it will take to set up a Japanese Win2003 Server image with this configuration, I request that Masayuki re-install TPTP and the agent controller (ensuring a clean install), and validate that this problem is reproducible.  If it is reproducible with a clean install, we will need to replicate your install in order to debug the problem.

Also, if this turns out to be a Win2003 server specific defect, I expect the urgency for a resolution this week will be decreased.
I did see this error both WindowsXP and Windows2003 Server Japanese. However it's not reproducible in the latest 200604040905.
